definition[0]: something that you can use to replace something that does not work or is lost
definition[1]: a copy of a computer document, program etc, which is made in case the original becomes lost or damaged
example[2]: Make a backup of any work you do on the computer.
definition[2]: people or things that can be used to provide support and help if they are needed
example[3]: Army units can only operate if they have sufficient backup.
definition[3]: someone who will play in a sports team if one of the other players is injured or ill
definition[4]: a copy of information held on a computer that is put onto a DISK so that the information is not lost if there is a problem with the computer
example[6]: Take a backup copy of the file to be converted.
